feature.label: BOMNET
feature.description: The plugin BOMNET loads an IFC file to generate environment files within OMNeT++ and INET projects.
feature.copyright: The plug-in BOMNET is an open source project under MIT license from LIGM Universit√© Gustave Eiffel 77420 Champs-sur-Marne FRANCE.
